overview: Artist Renoir Auguste called his nude models beautiful fruits. The film, Beautiful fruit, is an experimental documentary film by a woman artist on her trip to Seoul, Paris and Berlin in search for portraits of young female artists. The film director tries to approach personal lives of the female artists by properly arranging theree different films of Super8, 16mm color and 16mm black/white. The camera records in an essay style tone their first meetings, pictures of the artists making their works, their exhibitions and finally their trip to the grave of Vincent van Gogh on the out skirt of Paris.
title: Beautiful Fruit
